chapters.title: Chapter 11: What Lies Hidden
chapters.info: Corianin Nedeal, p. 204 (176)—The last Dreamer in the White Tower; an Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah. She died 473 years ago. All of the ter'angreal that Liandrin and her Black sisters stole were previously studied by Corianin, as was Egwene's twisted stone ring.
